info.name: shortest hexamaze (112 chars)
info.description:
improving [url]https://www.shadertoy.com/view//Mlc3zl[/url] using modern tricks (hoping they keep valid long).

best in fullscreen :-)

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage( O, u )                                   \
    vec3 U = u * mat3x2( 12, -7, 0, 14,    12, 7 ) / 1e2;   \
    O  += .1 / fract(  U[ 1 + int( 2.* sin( 1e5* length( ceil( U.xy )))) ] )
renderpass.name: Image
